name: Gather.Build.Survive
description:
Gather. Build. Survive is a point and click game where you have to survive for 10 days in a sheltered house from zombie waves.

You will have to scavenge, upgrade, fight and most importantly keep your character well fed and rested.

It's an experience that combines strategy, sandbox, resource management and adventure in one unique game.

We hope you will enjoy the game and to support our next game project, visit our Patreon page: www.patreon.com/makeindies

Enjoy!
